name: Plant Drawings
description:
Here’s a collection of non-vector drawings of miscellaneous plants, made with Adobe Fresco/Procreate.


At the beginning of the pandemic, I started experimenting with different drawing apps on my iPad whilst assisting a small human with his virtual school assignments. (It helped keep me sane, honestly!) Since then, these drawings/files have just been hanging out in the cloud, so I thought I might share them. I hope you find them useful! ✌️ - Victoria
